item.title: Monopoly GO: How to Get More Wild Stickers
item.description:
The newest feature in Monopoly GO , Wild Sticker, has generated quite a buzz in the community. Those who have already received their first Wild Sticker are left in awe, impressed by the sticker’s magical abilities. A Wild Sticker is a one-of-a-kind card that allows players to choose any sticker of their choice and get one step closer to completing their Sticker Albums.

This interesting feature is a complete game-changer, as finding the 5-Star stickers in Monopoly GO can get stressful quickly. Thanks to the Wild Sticker, players no longer have to rely on luck to get new stickers. Keep reading to learn how you can get more Wild Stickers and easily finish Albums.

Updated by Usama Ali on Jan 14, 2025: Given their abilities to conjure up any missing sticker, Wild Stickers are a game-changer in Monopoly GO and players are constantly seeking new ways to get them. Since Scopely continues to shake things up with new updates, the mechanics to get Wild Stickers in Monopoly GO have changed. Even though Wild Stickers have become rare, they remain crucial for getting those Gold stickers and completing sticker sets. We’ve updated this guide with all the new ways you can get more Wild Stickers and use them to fill gaps in their sticker album.

How To Get More Wild Stickers

When the Wild Stickers update first rolled out, all Monopoly GO players got the chance to experience its magic and choose one new sticker to complete a set of their liking. They can pick out any sticker they want – even the Gold ones.

Unfortunately, it is not possible to undo your choice, so players should pick their sticker wisely. But keep in mind that more Wild Stickers will come. Listed below are all the ways players can get more Wild Stickers in Monopoly GO :

Minigames

The best way to get Wild Stickers in Monopoly GO is by playing the different minigames, like Partner Events, Tycoon Racers, Treasure Hunts, and Peg-E. These games often offer Wild Stickers as rewards for achieving high scores, completing challenges, or reaching specific milestones. While you’ll need to put in the work and find reliable partners for the co-op minigames, they’re still worth the effort because you can win a bunch of other prizes along the way.

Tournaments

Even though it’s pretty rare, Wild Stickers are often rewarded in everyday leaderboard tournaments in Monopoly GO . Whenever it’s available, you can get the Wild Sticker by scoring the most points and securing the top spot on the leaderboard. Tournaments are time-limited events and are usually around for one or two days, which is why you need to plan your playing strategy accordingly.

Wild Sticker Deals

Usually, Scopely features special offers that appear in the in-game store, allowing players to purchase Wild Stickers using real-world money. These deals can provide a direct and efficient way to get more Wild Stickers. This is perfect for when you’re close to completing the album and only need a few specific stickers.

item.title: Luck be a Landlord - Console Trailer
item.description: Luck be a Landlord is a roguelike deck-builder that is set to be released on PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, and Nintendo Switch on February 6th, 2025. Take a look at the console trailer here.

item.title: Dress to Impress: How to Get VIP
item.description:
Quick Links

  • How to Get VIP Pass in Dress To Impress
  • How To Get Dress To Impress VIP For Free
  • What Does VIP Pass Get You in Dress To Impress

Roblox ’s Dress to Impress has a variety of items you can customize and try on, but with VIP access, you can truly level up your fashion game and stand out from the crowd. Dress to Impress VIP members get an additional, full closet of their own, unique hairstyles, special poses, and new makeup options that are not available to regular players.

These exclusive items help VIP players get a significant edge in the competition. With VIP access, you'll have the power to create unforgettable outfits that not only impress but also own the runway. This ultimately increases your chances of winning and securing the top rank. Read to learn how to get VIP in Dress to Impress .

Updated by Usama Ali on Jan 14, 2025: Dress to Impress is an insanely popular Roblox game where players can express their creativity through fashion. While players can always mix and match to create unique outfits, Dress to Impress also features a VIP closet where they can get exclusive access to rare and limited-edition items. VIP status also grants players a prestigious golden title and makes them stand out from the crowd. If you're new to Dress to Impress and wondering if VIP is worth it, this guide has been updated with all the information you need to decide.

How to Get VIP Pass in Dress To Impress

While Dress to Impress is free to play on Roblox , you'll need to spend Robux to get a VIP Pass. Robux is the in-game currency of Roblox , which is purchased with real money.

When you’re playing Dress to Impress , click on the middle yellow icon located on the left side of your screen. This will open a menu displaying various in-game purchases, like Custom Makeup, VIP Pass, and the ability to Run Faster.

Click on the Purchase button under VIP, and you'll be presented with two options for Dress to Impress VIP:

  • VIP Gamepass : Gives you Permanent VIP access for 799 Robux .
  • VIP Monthly : A 30-day VIP subscription for only 299 Robux.

You can also gift the VIP Pass to a friend by clicking on the Gift box icon under the VIP card.

To finalize the purchase, click on the Purchase button next to your preferred VIP package. You'll be redirected to the payment screen. If you have enough Robux in your account, you’ll get VIP access in no time.

While the VIP Monthly plan is cheaper, it’s recommended to invest in the VIP Gamepass. With the Gamepass, you'll enjoy unlimited access to VIP benefits without having to renew your subscription every month.

How To Get Dress To Impress VIP For Free

Although it's impossible to get the Dress to Impress VIP Pass for free, you can try your luck at VIP Giveaways . Sometimes Dress to Impress devs, streamers, and even community members organize VIP giveaways. By participating in these events, you’ll have the chance to win a free VIP pass and enjoy its exclusive perks.

Alternatively, you can join Robux giveaways and secure some free Robux which you can use to purchase the Dress to Impress VIP Pass yourself.

What Does VIP Pass Get You in Dress To Impress

The VIP Pass grants you entry into a special closet where you’ll find a whole range of high-quality clothing, shoes, bags, and accessories. The most famous items in the VIP dressing studio are the iconic jellyfish skirt, a stunning floor-length dress, an elegant late-Victorian gown, a beautiful selection of wings, and a sword.

In addition to these statement items, the VIP room offers a curated selection of necklaces, bracelets, and earrings, which expand your jewelry options. For those concerned about others copying their looks, VIP gives you private dressing rooms and salon seats, so you can hide your fit until the final reveal.

Is VIP Worth It?

The decision to purchase VIP status depends on your priorities within the game. If you're really passionate about fashion, crave exclusive items, and want to stand out from the crowd, VIP can be a worthwhile investment. While some items are undoubtedly unique and eye-catching, with a bit of creativity, you can often achieve similar looks with regular closet items. Ultimately, the choice is yours.

item.title: Helldivers 2 Dev Arrowhead Addresses Upcoming Movie Adaptation
item.description:
Summary

  • Arrowhead Game Studios CCO Johan Pilestedt touched on the studio's involvement in the Helldivers 2 movie adaptation, saying “We are not Hollywood people, and we don’t know what it takes to make a movie...and therefore we don’t, and shouldn’t, have final say.”
  • Fans hope Arrowhead's involvement in the Helldivers 2 movie will ensure the adaptation stays loyal to the game's themes, avoiding suggestions like "gamer wakes up in Helldivers universe."
  • Sony announced the Helldivers 2 movie, a Horizon Zero Dawn adaptation, and a Ghost of Tsushima animation at CES 2025.

Democracy is coming to the silver screen following the announcement of a new Helldivers 2 live-action movie from Sony, and Arrowhead Game Studios, the team behind the shooter, CCO Johan Pilestedt has clarified the team’s involvement. During CES 2025, Sony announced two other projects alongside the Helldivers 2 movie, including a Horizon Zero Dawn movie adaptation, and a Ghost of Tsushima animation.

The co-op third-person shooter Helldivers 2 launched in February 2024 and found immediate success thanks to its brutal combat against Terminids and Automatons, and its comical comradery. Looking to the future, with the shooter's success paving the way, Arrowhead is working on the next game to succeed Helldivers 2 . With updates continuing throughout 2025 on Super Earth, Pilestedt said the team was open to feedback from the community to help craft the next project during the early stages of development.

Sony announced the Helldivers 2 movie was a collaboration between Sony Productions and Sony Pictures, but head of PlayStation Productions Asad Qizilbash remained tight-lipped on any further details. Since the Helldivers community is rather protective of the source material, fans have been asking if Arrowhead would be involved in the development. Pilestedt finally responded on Twitter and admitted he had been dodging this question. The CCO confirmed the studio would be involved, but stated “We are not Hollywood people, and we don’t know what it takes to make a movie.” Pilestedt continued, “And therefore we don’t, and shouldn’t, have final say.”

Helldivers 2 Dev Touches on Arrowhead's Involvement in Movie Adaptation

Helldivers fans are adamant the movie has to strike the right tone, and to achieve this, the community is keen to see Arrowhead involved as much as possible, so the script and action remain loyal to the game. One Twitter user expressed concern that producers and writers would try to make the movie “their own,” and one idea players didn’t want to see was “gamer wakes up in Helldivers universe.” Most agreed Arrowhead should have the final say on the script, theme, and aesthetic of the movie, and another fan thought it was paramount the Helldivers never take their helmets off.

While a Helldivers 2 movie sounds like an action-packed time on the silver screen, comparisons have been drawn to a pre-existing cult classic. Starship Troopers is a 1997 sci-fi action film directed by Paul Verhoeven and based on the 1959 novel by Robert A. Heinlein. The premise involves a militant branch of the Earth-based United Citizen Federation that is caught in an interstellar war with alien Arachnids, and gamers hope Helldivers 2 can set itself apart from Starship Troopers , possibly by getting rid of the common alien insects.

item.title: Disney Dreamlight Valley: How to Make Arcane Garlic Crab
item.description:
Quick Links

  • Arcane Garlic Crab Recipe in Disney Dreamlight Valley

Restoring the Dreamlight Valley to its former glory is going to take a lot of work, and you’ll need plenty of energy to keep going. One great way to stay energized is by cooking meals, and there are tons of recipes you can make in the game. The rarer the ingredients, the more energy your meal will give you.

Arcane Garlic Crab is a four-star entree introduced in Disney Dreamlight Valley: Storybook Vale . Unlike some other recipes, all its ingredients are found within Storybook Vale, so you won’t need to travel back to Dreamlight Valley . However, it can still be tricky to figure out what you need to make it. Here's a quick guide to help you gather the ingredients.

Arcane Garlic Crab Recipe in Disney Dreamlight Valley

Players will need the following materials:

  • 1 x Garlic
  • 1 x Any Spice
  • 1 x Sorcerer Hat Hermit Crab
  • 1 x Salt Crystal.

Getting Garlic in DDV

Garlic is the easiest ingredient to find for this recipe. If you’ve been cooking in Dreamlight Valley for a while, you probably know where to get it. You can gather Garlic from several biomes, including:

  • Everafter
  • Forest of Valor
  • The Grove
  • The Lagoon
  • Frozen Realm.

Getting a Spice Ingredient

For the Arcane Garlic Crab recipe, DDV players can use any spice ingredient of their choice. The game has plenty of spice options, so you should be able to find one easily in a nearby biome. Some spices that work perfectly for this dish include:

  • Lightning Spice
  • Ambrosia
  • Ginger
  • Paprika
  • Oregano
  • Mint
  • Majestea.

Getting Sorcerer Hat Hermit Crab in DDV

Next, you’ll need to catch the Sorcerer Hat Hermit Crab. This seafood ingredient is a bit tricky to get because it’s a rare spawn. DDV fans should fish in golden bubbles, as that’s where this ingredient appears.

Getting Salt Crystals in DDV

To get Salt Crystals, you will need to equip your fishing rod and cast your line in the water without any bubbles. Salt Crystals are pretty common here, as there aren’t many other materials you will reel in outside of bubbles. You will be able to gather plenty of them quickly.

Once you have all the ingredients, find a stove (one is available in your house). Interact with the stove and add the ingredients to cook Arcane Garlic Crab. After it’s made, you can either eat it to restore 3,250 energy or sell it for 1,335 Star Coins.
